articles.title: Jayson Tatum scores 29 as Boston Celtics complete sweep of Brooklyn Nets - ESPN India
articles.description: Jayson Tatum scored 29 points, Jaylen Brown had 22 and the Boston Celtics completed a four-game sweep of the Brooklyn Nets, becoming the first team to reach the second round of the playoffs with a 116-112 victory Monday night.
articles.content:
